welcome.line1: We're delighted to have you here, and we truly appreciate your interest in the Bretton Woods Gold Tokens. While we share your enthusiasm for this unique investment opportunity, we must inform you that, at present, we are unable to offer the tokens for sale.
welcome.line2: We are sincerely committed to only selling tokens that are fully backed by gold, which is securely stored with our partners in Swiss vaults. Unfortunately we are facing some delays in the gold acquisition and are thus unable to sell tokens at this time.
welcome.line3: As soon as BWG becomes available for purchase, we will notify you via email and in app notification. We look forward to providing you with an exceptional investment experience and thank you for your patience and interest.

acknowledge.line1: Your crypto-wallet has been successfully connected.
acknowledge.line2: Your Seed Phrase and Private Key give full access to your Wallet. Always keep them safe. Never share this information with anyone.
acknowledge.line3: Please note that neither we nor your Wallet-Provider will ever ask for your seed phrase or private key. Be wary of scammers who may try to obtain this information from you.
acknowledge.line4: Only input your seed phrase if you are installing a Wallet on a new device. Remember to back up your seed phrase in a safe place, as it will be needed to restore your wallet if your device is lost or stolen.
acknowledge.line5: To further increase your security, consider using a Hardware Wallet.

deleteAccount.text3: Account deletion is irreversible. Once you confirm, your account cannot be recovered, and any associated content will be lost.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.text1: We apologize for the inconvenience, but our website is currently undergoing maintenance.
maintenance.text2: We're working hard to improve your experience and will be back up and running as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
maintenance.text3: Please note that we do not hold any of your funds on our platform. All of your funds are securely stored in your own non-custodial wallet, and you have complete control over them. You can use your funds freely and at any time without any involvement from us. We want to ensure that you have complete peace of mind knowing that your assets are safe and under your control.

login.title1: What can I do on the Bretton Woods Gold Platform?
login.description1: The Bretton Woods Gold platform primarily serves as a hub for gold investment. Here, you can acquire gold-backed tokens that combine the advantages of physical gold with those of a blockchain token. With our Bretton Woods Digital Gold Token (BWG), you can enjoy the security and stability of gold investment while retaining the flexibility to trade or make payments using your gold, accessible through your phone or computer. Say goodbye to worries about storage, accessibility, or the liquidation of even small amounts like a dollar. With BWG, you have round-the-clock access to your investment and premium security.
login.title2: What is KYC and how do I complete it?
login.description2: KYC stands for "Know Your Customer" and is an identification process that financial institutions and other regulated companies use to verify the identity of their customers. This is usually required before opening a new account or conducting certain transactions. To complete KYC, you will need to present personal identification documents, such as a government-issued ID card or passport. You will also need either a computer with a camera or your cell phone to perform live facial identification.
login.title3: Am I eligible to register and trade here?
login.description3: We currently provide our services to customers aged 18 and above in Europe and America. We conduct a standard KYC (Know Your Customer) check, which excludes individuals with a criminal background, unusual political status, or those from countries where we are not licensed to operate.

dashboard.title1: How do I connect a wallet?

description1.text: There are several options to connect a wallet to our platform. Depending on whether you are using a desktop computer, smartphone or tablet. We also offer a range of compatible wallets. To find out more please visit our youtube for some helpful videos on how to connect your wallet:

dashboard.title2: I am having trouble connecting my wallet. How do I solve this?'

description2.text1: Please first make sure that you have disabled any adblocker software, as this can lead to connection problems with your wallet. If you are using the brave browser disabled the shields (integrated adblocking) and you will be able to connect. If you are still facing problems connecting a valid wallet, as showcased on our

dashboard.title3: What happens when I make a purchase?
dashboard.description3: To make a purchase, you first need a connected wallet on our platform so that we have a place to send the purchased tokens. Once you complete a FIAT purchase, we wait for the payment to clear and immediately transfer the tokens to your connected wallet. You will receive a notification on the platform that we have received your payment and that we have transferred the tokens to your wallet. Depending on the activity on the blockchain, it may take a few minutes for the funds to arrive in your wallet, as blockchain transaction times vary depending on the workload and time of day. Please allow at least half an hour before worrying about a failed transfer.
dashboard.title4: What are the gold storage costs and how does the deduction work?
dashboard.description4: The deposited gold of the BWG token is securely stored in Switzerland. This security and guarantee generate costs. Therefore, each token with the gold deposited will participate in the costs in advance every quarter in an automated process. Because the price of gold as well as storage costs change over time, we reserve the right to adjust prices accordingly. Customers will be notified of price adjustments in advance. If the customer has been charged too much, then a cashback event will be held on our platform, where loaded wallets can be registered and the overpaid costs will be refunded to the customers.
dashboard.title5: How do I pay with Crypto tokens?
dashboard.description5: Currently, payment with cryptocurrencies is not possible. As soon as we receive regulatory permission, we will accept common stablecoins. To pay with crypto tokens, you need to have BNB in your wallet to pay blockchain transfer fees for a transaction as well as the stablecoin you mean to pay with.

description6.text1: If you are having trouble connecting your wallet, either not being redirected back from the wallet to our application or not getting the connection dialogue please try the following steps.
description6.text2: 1. Close the Bretton Woods Gold app and open it again, then try to connect your wallet.
description6.text3: 2. If that did not resolve it please try closing the app and wallet and try to connect again.
description6.text4: 3. If you are facing persistent issues and the steps above did not resolve it, please contact our support and supply the details of your error, wallet of choice and phone, to receive personalized support.

howItWorks.title1: Invitation via Link or Referral Code
howItWorks.description1: As an affiliate, you will receive a unique invitation link and referral code that you can share with potential users. By using your link or code, these new users will be associated with your affiliate account, ensuring that you receive commissions for their actions.
howItWorks.description2: When a user, invited through your link or code, purchases BWG Tokens, you will earn a direct commission of 20% of the CV generated from their transaction. This commission is a reflection of the value you bring to our platform by introducing new users who engage with our products.
howItWorks.description3: The benefits of our affiliate system extend beyond just your direct referrals. If the new user you invited also becomes an affiliate and invites further users who purchase BWG Tokens, you will receive a Uni-Level commission of 4% of the CV. This Uni-Level commission ensures that you continue to earn passive income from the activities of affiliates within your referral network.

benefitsConfig.title1: Free to Join, No Monthly Costs
benefitsConfig.description1: At Bretton Woods AG, we believe in empowering our affiliates. That's why we offer a completely free membership with no hidden monthly costs. You can join our affiliate program and start earning without any financial commitments. It's a risk-free opportunity to explore your earning potential!
benefitsConfig.description2: Say goodbye to the constraints of a traditional job! As our affiliate, you have the freedom to work whenever, wherever, and with whomever you want. Whether you're a night owl or an early riser, you can run your affiliate business at your own pace, fitting it seamlessly into your lifestyle. Enjoy the flexibility to work from the comfort of your home or while traveling the world. The choice is yours!
benefitsConfig.title3: Be Among the First and Secure Your Passive Income
benefitsConfig.description3: Timing is everything, and joining our affiliate program early means you'll be one of the first affiliates to capitalize on this incredible opportunity. As we launch our program, you'll have the chance to establish a strong foundation for your passive income. By promoting our gold-backed products, you'll tap into a lucrative market, setting yourself up for long-term success.
benefitsConfig.description4: With our affiliate program, you'll have a turnkey business at your fingertips. Once you receive your unique affiliate link, you can start sharing it right away. Even before your conversion to an affiliate account is completed, you'll begin receiving the full benefits. We provide you with all the necessary tools and support to maximize your earning potential. It's never been easier to start generating income!
benefitsConfig.description5: When you share your affiliate link, your earning potential doesn't stop there. Our affiliate program is designed to reward your efforts over time. Your affiliate link will continue to earn you commissions as more people convert and make purchases. As Bretton Woods AG expands its product offerings and introduces new initiatives, you'll have even more opportunities to earn as an affiliate. Your success is our success!

poolConfig.description1: The pools are paid out on a monthly basis. If no one is in the pool the collected funds stay there and will be paid out in the next month if anyone has qualified for the pool. Pool shares are divided evenly between the number of qualified users. So if 2 users are assigned to a payout for a pool they each get 50%, in case of 10 users they get 10% each.

poolArray.line1: 1. Dynamic Compression Pool - Requires 5 Personal Tokens sales in one calendar month to qualify
poolArray.line2: 2. Infinity Bonus Pool - 10% of CV collected
poolArray.line3: 3. Performer Bonus Pool - 10% of CV collected
poolArray.line4: 4. Global Leaders Bonus Pool - 10% of CV collected
poolArray.line5: 5. Incentive Pool - 10% of CV collected - From this special incentives and prizes can be won
poolArray.line6: 6. Success builder Bonus Pool - 3% of CV collected
poolArray.line7: 7. Charity Pool - 1% of CV collected - Affiliates give back! This goes to a charity to support a good cause

convertAffiliate.title1: Join Our Affiliate Program and Unlock Your Potential with Bretton Woods AG
convertAffiliate.text1: Are you looking for an exciting opportunity to earn a passive income while enjoying the freedom to work on your own terms? Look no further! Join the Bretton Woods AG Affiliate Program today and embark on a journey towards financial success. As one of our valued affiliates, you'll gain access to a range of benefits that will help you build a rock-solid income stream, backed by the power of gold. Don't miss out on this chance of a lifetime to be one of our pioneering affiliates!
convertAffiliate.text2: At the Bretton Woods digital AG, we believe in rewarding our affiliates for their efforts in driving the growth of our platform. Our affiliate system is designed to provide you with a lucrative opportunity to earn substantial commissions by simply inviting new users to join and engage with our BWG Token. Let's dive into how our affiliate system works and how you can benefit:

example.line1: A Sale of 1000$ with 20% Fees = 200$ Fees
example.line2: 10% of Fees goes to Affiliates CV* = 20$
example.line5: 44% of CV is divided into the pools = 8,80$

convertAffiliate.text3: In the affiliate system there are several pools. The dynamic compression pool that collects left over unilevel or unclaimed direct commission and regular pools that get between 1 - 10% of the CV (commissionable volume) each. The final version of the marketing plan will be published in 2024 with all requirements for pool qualification specified. Until then the top performers and global leaders are placed in the pools manually by our president of sales and marketing. For questions please inquire at pa-sales@brettonwoods.ch.
convertAffiliate.text4: Be one of the first affiliates to secure your place and embark on a journey towards a solid passive income. Join us today and let's unlock your potential together!
convertAffiliate.needDownload: You need to download and read the affiliate Terms & Conditions before agreeing
